top_categories.workout_context: 67ft/mi means long efforts at or near FTP on every climb. If your threshold cracks at minute 15, you'll walk the rest.
Castellon Gravel Race's Spanish rolling, European gravel forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 75 miles.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Castellon Gravel Race's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before February.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Castellon Gravel Race. Train it until it feels boring.
75 miles on spanish rolling gravel burns energy faster than the distance suggests. Train the fade resistance now.
At Castellon Gravel Race, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
5,000ft of climbing means repeated surges above threshold. VO2max work is how you survive the fifth climb, not just the first.
How long can you hold 105% FTP before you blow? At Castellon Gravel Race, that number decides whether you bridge or get dropped.
Double-threshold training builds sustained power with less fatigue. More FTP per hour of training.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 5,000ft of climbing on spanish rolling gravel does to your power file on race day.
5,000ft of climbing on grades that change every minute. You need to switch from seated to standing without losing rhythm.
Short, max efforts are unavoidable. Punchy climbs, gap closures, attacks on spanish rolling gravel. If you haven't trained them, you'll crack.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Castellon Gravel Race’s 75 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Castellon Gravel Race requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on spanish rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: spanish rolling, european gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Gravel Specific, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 75 miles of spanish rolling gravel in Castellon, Spain.
